# Files to exclude from release package

# Development files
.git/
.github/
.gitignore
.gitattributes
.editorconfig

# Node modules
node_modules/
package-lock.json

# Tests
tests/
cypress/
cypress.config.js
phpunit.xml.dist
.phpunit.cache/

# Development configs
vite.config.js
postcss.config.js
tailwind.config.js
composer-setup.php

# Build artifacts
build/logs/
writable/logs/*
writable/cache/*
writable/session/*
writable/debugbar/*
writable/uploads/*
!writable/logs/.htaccess
!writable/cache/.htaccess
!writable/session/.htaccess
!writable/debugbar/.htaccess
!writable/uploads/.htaccess

# Environment files
.env
.env.example
env

# Development docs
docs/development/
docs/testing/
notes/

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
*.sql
cookies.txt

# Logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Temporary files
*.tmp
temp/
tmp/
